name: GenesisBot
description: A powerful and customizable WhatsApp bot powered by Genesis AI âš¡

DEV.description: Enter your phone number(s) as bot owner, without + or spaces (e.g., 254738701209)

ANTIDELETE.description: Set TRUE to auto-forward deleted messages to your PM

AUTOREJECT_CALL.description: Set TRUE to auto-decline incoming WhatsApp calls

ANTIFOREIGN.description: Set TRUE to remove users with different country codes from groups

HEROKU_API.description: Paste your Heroku API key here for advanced deployment control

BAD_WORD.description: Comma-separated list of banned words (e.g., fuck,pussy,bitch)

BAD_WORD_KICK.description: Set TRUE to auto-kick users who use banned words

ANTITAG.description: Set TRUE to prevent excessive tagging in groups

AUTOREAD.description: Set TRUE to auto-read private messages

AUTOVIEW.description: Set TRUE to auto-view status updates

WELCOMEGOODBYE.description: Set TRUE to enable welcome/goodbye group messages

ANTILINK.description: Set TRUE to kick users who post WhatsApp group links

ANTILINK_ALL.description: Set TRUE to kick users who post any links

ANTIBOT.description: Set TRUE to kick other bots from group chats

SESSION.description: Paste the generated session ID for login

MODE.description: PRIVATE for owner-only access, PUBLIC for global access

AUTOBIO.description: Set TRUE to auto-update bio with date/time

GPT_INBOX.description: Set TRUE to auto-reply private messages with AI (unstable)

MENU_TYPE.description: IMAGE, VIDEO, or LINK for menu format

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: Set TRUE to auto-like statuses (requires AUTOVIEW)
